section.p: The Complications section records problems that occurred during the procedure or other activity. The complications may have been known risks or unanticipated problems.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8174, CONF:10384 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.37"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15453)/@code="55109-3" Complications (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15454)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:8176, R2.1=CONF:1198-8176)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:8177, R2.1=CONF:1198-8177)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8795, CONF:8796)
Conforms to Problem Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
There SHALL be a statement providing details of the complication(s) or it SHALL explicitly state there were no complications. (CONF:8797)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15453)/@code="55109-3" Complications (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15454)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:8176, R2.1=CONF:1198-8176)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:8177, R2.1=CONF:1198-8177)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8795, CONF:8796)
Conforms to Problem Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
There SHALL be a statement providing details of the complication(s) or it SHALL explicitly state there were no complications. (CONF:8797)
